attributes.title: ✨🧚‍♂️Not working out🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.review: 🧚‍♀️✨🦋When I got this app I was expecting there to be a decent amount of information about what he was planning on doing in the future, but it was mostly about Biden and making it seem like different groups are for his re-election. 🦋✨🧚‍♂️

attributes.title: DO NOT GET
attributes.review: It was honestly the worst thing i did for my phone. After i had gotten the all my phone would not stop glitching. it sent me about 50 notifications today. I hate it!!!! I had to restart my iphone 3 times. Do NOT get the app if you don’t wanna buy a new phone!!!!

attributes.title: You
attributes.review: So you think you can get rid of TikTok you thought rough and I’m black and when black lives MATTER then all lives can matter I can’t go to a good school because my mom is black and I have been going to the same school BUT I do like the  Kardashian‘s I hope Kanye take your place B

attributes.title: Stealing your identification
attributes.review: As soon as I download it it started saying that it was taking my information from my phone and my phone started saying that all of my things are compromised don’t download this app they’re taking all of your stuff

attributes.title: don’t understand the hype🤷‍♀️
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see what all the hype was about but when i downloaded it i seen a huge pumpkin with arms😨i almost had a heart attack and after that i got a text message saying ways to support trump and they kept texting so i was sick of it and finally texted them back saying go away that’s when i noticed the text messages were green🤢🤮 and i can’t believe they have the audacity to treat me with such low respect the nerve, the audacity, the gumption, the gall smh 🤦‍♀️😒

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This app was so bad too much explicit content and was very childish Hes not capable of running an app much less America the app was too glitchy and laggy and I know it wasn’t my phone or wifi DUH so this app and trump is just all around bad and my for finally review I’ll give it a “no❤️”

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: The app gave my phone bugs, the app made my phone glitchy, the app was taking forever to download even though my internet is high speed so I tried shutting my phone down when I turned it on it kept on glitching me out of other apps so I deleted it!!

attributes.title: No.❤️
attributes.review: The app is just horrible!  I don't even understand why Our president has a app when he has twitter and knows that we will vote him. ✨🧚 My app kept on glitching ad saying how it will not work in my area even though,My connection is perfectly fine.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I kept putting my email and it wouldn’t let me join even tho it was correct, I’m also VERY disappointed that Donald trump is our president since the only thing he is doing is not making America great, he’s RIPPING it apart. We need a new president instead of this excuse of a man!

attributes.title: Took out my WiFi
attributes.review: I was trying to download the app and it sat there for hours and hours not even close to being finished and when I finally opened the app I started to see 🍊 flashing in and out I went to write my review then deleted the app.
